message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $10,250. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,500 and $10,250, which would be $9,875. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
